channel.title: Help Please (639)(637) Summoning Eclipse Style

item.title: Help Please (639)(637) Summoning Eclipse Style
item.dc:creator: @roflscape roflscape
item.description:
@roflscape wrote:

I have everything 100% but I cant seem to get this to work. Its 100% Pouch making and everything The ONLY problem is getting it to summon… It gives me this code…

public static boolean summon(Player player, int itemId, int slot) { SummoningPouch pouch = SummoningPouch.get(itemId); if (pouch == null) { return false; } else if (player.getFamiliar().getId() > 0) { player.sendMessage("You already have a familiar."); return true; } else if (player.getSkills().getLevelForExperience(Skills.SUMMONING) < pouch.getLevelRequired()) { player.sendMessage("You need a summoning level of " + pouch.getLevelRequired() + " to summon this familiar."); return true; } else if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SUMMONING) < pouch.getSummonCost()) { player.sendMessage("You do not have enough summoning points left to summon this familiar."); return true; } NPC familiar = World.getWorld().register(pouch.getNpcId(), player.getLocation()); if (!familiar.isFamiliar()) { player.sendMessage("Invalid familiar, report to an administrator - pouch id: " + itemId); familiar.instantDeath(); return true; } player.getSkills().setLevel(Skills.SUMMONING, player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SUMMONING) - pouch.getSummonCost()); player.getInventory().set(slot, null); player.getInventory().refresh(); familiar.getFamiliar().setOwner(player); player.setFamiliar(familiar.getFamiliar()); player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.SUMMONING, pouch.getSummonExperience()); familiar.getFamiliar().init(); return true; }

NPC familiar = World.getWorld().register(pouch.getNpcId(), player.getLocation());
if (!familiar.isFamiliar()) {
player.sendMessage("Invalid familiar, report to an administrator - pouch id: " + itemId);
familiar.instantDeath();
return true;
